title: Shower
excerpt: Prostrate, / face pressed against a cool porcelain wall / skin folds, to rills and runnels.
fullText:
Shower
----------
Prostrate,
    face pressed against a cool porcelain wall
    skin folds, to rills and runnels.

Clasping my knees I stretch to smooth my skin
    and reduce mean draft,
    and reduce me through measured breaths.

There is only sensation.
We travel its curve together.
